title: Aurelion sol should have a shenron skin from DBZ
body: i think aurelion sol should have a skin that looks like shenron from DBZ i think the three stars that orbit aurelion should be dragon balls.

replies.body: Shenron skin #5 ability: grant any wish
instantly kill random enemy after hitting an enemy champ with 7 stars*
Holy crap. I would become an Aurelion Sol main if that happened =P

And "Gurren Lagan" isn't? 

If they can get past copyright on super galaxy rumble, I'm sure they can do the same on "wish-giver Aurelion sol"
They could easily get Wish-Giver Aurelion Sol, I meant that it would be copyright if they had "Shenrrelion Sol" or "Aushenron Sol" or "Aurelion Shenron" ok I'll stop.
